results.title: Postmarketing survey of the effects of an atenolol/chlorthalidone combination in the treatment of hypertension.
results.text_hl: There were no adverse experiences that had not been reported previously, and only @<m>DISEASE_Dizziness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@ exceeded an incidence of 1%.

results.title: A comparative study of nebivolol and (S) atenolol on blood pressure and heart rate on essential hypertensive patients
results.text_hl: Fifty milligrams of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@(S)-atenolol@@@ is equivalent to 100 mg of racemic @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in its efficacy.

results.title: Cadralazine, a new vasodilator, in addition to a beta-blocker for long-term treatment of hypertension.
results.text_hl: During @CHEMICAL_cadralazine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C031877 @@@cadralazine@@@ treatment, heart rate was always significantly lower than before @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ alone; the most common side effects, many of which were already present during treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ alone, included @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@, @DISEASE_Asthenia @DISEASE_MESH:D001247 @@@asthenia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Dizziness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@, @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@palpitation@@@ and @DISEASE_Flushing @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@, and tended to disappear spontaneously as therapy progressed.

citations.NLM: Salvadeo A, Villa G, Segagni S, Piazza V, Picardi L, Romano M, Parini J. Cadralazine, a new vasodilator, in addition to a beta-blocker for long-term treatment of hypertension. Arzneimittelforschung. 1985;35(3):623-5. PMID: 2859865
citations.BibTeX: @article{2859865, title={Cadralazine, a new vasodilator, in addition to a beta-blocker for long-term treatment of hypertension.}, author={Salvadeo A and Villa G and Segagni S and Piazza V and Picardi L and Romano M and Parini J}, journal={Arzneimittelforschung}, volume={35}, number={3}, pages={623-5}}

results.title: Sympathetic responsiveness and antihypertensive effect of beta-receptor blockade in essential hypertension.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ induced a marked @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@decrease in blood pressure and@@@ pulse rate during recumbency, @<m>DISEASE_Dizziness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@orthostasis@@@ and exercise concomitant with a marked increase in plasma @CHEMICAL_Norepinephrine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009638 @@@noradrenaline@@@ concentration (p less than 0.0125) and a pronounced decrease in plasma @GENE_REN @GENE_5972 @@@renin@@@ concentration (p less than 0.01).

citations.NLM: Distler A, Keim HJ, Cordes U, Philipp T, Wolff HP. Sympathetic responsiveness and antihypertensive effect of beta-receptor blockade in essential hypertension. Am J Med. 1978 Mar;64(3):446-51. PMID: 25017

results.title: Head-up tilt test in complicated neurocardiogenic syncope in children.
results.text_hl: In one each, @DISEASE_Tachycardia_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017180 @@@ventricular tachycardia@@@ and @DISEASE_Unconsciousness @DISEASE_MESH:D014474 @@@loss of consciousness@@@ without @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ and @DISEASE_Bradycardia @DISEASE_MESH:D001919 @@@bradycardia@@@ were induced. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ was tried in 5 with improvement of @DISEASE_Syncope_Vasovagal @DISEASE_MESH:D019462 @@@NCS@@@ in 4 and aggravation of @<m>DISEASE_Dizziness</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@ in 1.

citations.NLM: Noh CI, Kim HS. Head-up tilt test in complicated neurocardiogenic syncope in children. J Korean Med Sci. 1997 Feb;12(1):44-8. PMID: 9142659
